message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we settle on $750000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $725000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $735000?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $730000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $735500?
